posts.post_content:
Posted By: Donny Muth
All,

  I'm looking for a gift to give in a secret Santa exchange.  I am hoping to find 1, or possibly 2, raw T206s of common major or minor league players from any of the Ohio teams (Cincinnati, Cleveland, Toledo, etc.).  I am not out to spend much money, so lower grades are fine as long as they are presentable.  I can't afford HOFers or rare backs or anything extravagant for this, so please be mindful of that.  

Please let me know what you have (scans preferred) and what price you're asking. 

Thanks a lot!


---Donny

Posted By: Tim Sanders
Sent with scans of 3 cards.

Posted By: Richard Cline - RC
Email sent.

RC

Posted By: Steve Murray
